name: Apophis (XtraCritical)
description:
-This a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2-

Delve into the Realm of Chaos and fight through its depths!

Apophis is a roguelite, dungeon-crawler with gameplay and art inspired by classic top-down action RPGs.

You take on the role of a hoplite soldier that had fallen in battle, only to be whisked away from death by the chaos goddess Eris. She has been sealed away inside of her own temple statues by the snake go Apophis who has taken her realm as his own. Eris has promised to restore your life if you are able to dive below, defeat the intrusive deity, and restore her as the goddess of Chaos.
